content.raw:
I completed the support of this functions in `hxgz.c` in ee3f5ec .

Note that I commented the calls to `hxs_add_constraint` and `hxs_remove_constraint` in `hxs_example.m`. If we don't provide a Gazebo implementation for these calls, the handsim tests will fail. I put note that we should enable them when the Gazebo implementation happens.
content.html:
I completed the support of this functions in hxgz.c in ee3f5ec .

Note that I commented the calls to hxs_add_constraint and hxs_remove_constraint in hxs_example.m. If we don't provide a Gazebo implementation for these calls, the handsim tests will fail. I put note that we should enable them when the Gazebo implementation happens.
